{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Firefly |model=FireWRT |revision=(AC1200) |est_release_date=05/2015 |is_manuf=Yes |availability=unavailable, perhaps unreleased |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621A |cpu1_cores=2 |cpu1_cspeed=880 MHz |fla1=16 |fla1_model=SPI |ram1=512 |ram1_model=DDR3 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, USB 3.0, SATA |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=2 |jtag=yes |serial=yes,, |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7602E |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612E |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=NFC Controller;MediaTek;MT6605;;1;,,, Serial ATA Controller;ASMedia;ASM1061;;1; |flags=NFC support, TF card slot |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, LEDE |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }} {{TagLine|Firefly FireWRT AC1200 Wireless Router}} :[http://en.t-firefly.com/en/firelink/firewrt/ Product page] {{•}} [http://en.t-firefly.com/en/firelink/firewrt/download/ Download page] {{•}} [http://developer.t-firefly.com/forum.php?mod=forumdisplay&fid=186 Support page]
As of Nov 2017, it seems to have been discontinued.
*[http://www.aliexpress.com/store/product/Open-Beta-for-Engineering-prototype-Need-to-get-beta-code-before-buying/1710008_32346552568.html On '''AliExpress''']
